K10sf258_sc:2: Wal_2_2 tena khalu samayenāyuṣmān upaseno rājagṛhe viharati śītavane śmaśāne sarpaśauṇḍikaprāgbhāre kaliṁkopavicārāntarikāyām /
K10sf258_sc:3: Wal_2_3 athāyuṣmata upasenasya ekākino rahasigatasya pratisaṁlīnasya āśīviṣaḥ kāye nipatita uggratejā ghoraviṣaḥ parittas tadyathā āṁjanaśalākā /
K10sf258_sc:4: Wal_2_4 tatrāyuṣmān upaseno bhikṣūn āmaṁtrayati / āśīviṣo me kāye nipatitaḥ tadyathā āṁjanaśalākā /
K10sf258_sc:5: aṁga tāvan me āyuṣmantaḥ kāyaṁ samaṁtato ’nuparigṛhya bahir abhinirharata mā ihaiva
K10sf258_sc:7: Wal_2_5 tena khalu samayenāyuṣmāñ śāriputra āyuṣmata upasenasya nātidūre niṣaṇṇo ’bhūd anyataram vṛkṣamūlaṁ niśritya /
K10sf258_sc:8: Wal_2_6 aśrauṣīd āyuṣmāñ śāriputra āyuṣmata upasenasya vāgvyāhāram / śrutvā ca punar yenāyuṣmān upasenas tenopajagāma / upetyāyuṣmantam upasenam idam avocat /
K10sf258_sc:9: Wal_2_7 na khalu vayam āyuṣmata upasenasya paśyāmo mukhasya vā anyathātvam indriyāṇāṁ vā
K10sf258_sc:10: nānākaraṇam / atha ca punar āyuṣmān upasena evam āha / āśīviṣo me kāye nipatitaḥ
K10sf258_sc:12: Wal_2_8 yasyāyuṣmāñ śariputra evaṁ syāt / ahaṁ cakṣur mama cakṣuḥ / ahaṁ śrottaṁ ghrāṇaṁ
K10sf258_sc:13: jihvā kāyaḥ / ahaṁ manaḥ / mama manaḥ / ahaṁ rūpaṁ mama rūpam / ahaṁ śabdagandharasaspṛṣṭavyadharmā
K10sf258_sc:14: mama dharmāḥ / ahaṁ pṛthivīdhātur mama pṛthivīdhātuḥ / aham abdhātus tejodhātur vāyudhātur
K10sf258_sc:15: ākāśadhātur vijñānadhātuḥ / ahaṁ rūpaskandho mama rūpaskandhaḥ / ahaṁ vedanāsaṁjñāsaṁskāravijñānaskandho
K10sf258_sc:16: mama vijñānaskandhaḥ / tasya syād mukhasya vā anyathātvam indriyāṇāṁ vā nānākaraṇam /
K10sf258_sc:17: Wal_2_9 mama tu naivaṁ bhavati / ahaṁ cakṣur mama cakṣuḥ / tadyathā ahaṁ vijñānaskandho mama vijñānaskandhaḥ / tasya me kiṁ bhaviṣyati mukhasya vā anyathātvam indriyāṇāṁ vā nānākaraṇam /
K10sf258_sc:18: Wal_10 dīragharāttraṁ khalv āyuṣmata upasenasya ahaṁkaramamaṁkarāsmimānābhiniveśānuśayaḥ
K10sf258_sc:19: prahīṇāḥ parijñātā ucchinnamūlās tālamastakavad anābhavagatikā āyatyām anutpādadharmāṇaḥ /
K10sf258_sc:20: tasya te kiṁ bhaviṣyati mukhasya vā anyathātvam indriyāṇāṁ vā nānākaraṇam /
K10sf258_sc:21: Wal_11 athāyuṣmāñ śariputtraḥ āyuṣmata upasenasya kāyaṁ sāmantakenānuparigṛhya bahir abhinirharati /
K10sf258_sc:22: Wal_12 samanantarābhinirhṛta āyuṣmata upasenasya kāyaḥ śataśo viśirṇas tadyathā busamuṣṭiḥ /
K10sf258_sc:23: Wal_13 athāyuṣmāñ śāriputro ’syāṁ velāyāṁ gāthā babhāse /
K10sf258_sc:24: Wal_14 sucīrṇe brahmacarye ’smin mārge caiva subhāvite /
K10sf258_sc:26: Wal_15 sucīrṇe brahmacarye ’smin mārge caiva subhāvite /
K10sf258_sc:28: Wal_16 sucīrṇe brahmacarye ’smin mārge caiva subhāvite /
K10sf258_sc:29: ādīptād vā gṛhād mukto maraṇānte na śocate //
K10sf258_sc:30: Wal_17 sucīrṇe brahmacarye ’smin mārge caiva subhāvite /
K10sf258_sc:32: Wal_18 athāyuṣmāñ śāriputra āyuṣmata upasenasya śarīre śāripūjāṁ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṁs tenopajagāma upetya bhagavatpādau śirasā vanditvā ekāṁte nyaṣīdat /
K10sf258_sc:33: Wal_19 ekāṁtaniṣaṇṇa āyuṣmāñ śāriputtro bhagavaṁtam idam avocat /
K10sf258_sc:34: Wal_20 āyuṣmato bhadaṁta upasenasya āśīviṣaḥ kāye nipatita ugratejā ghoraviṣaḥ parittas tadyathāṁ janaśalākā pūrvavad yāvat tasya kāyo viśīrṇas tadyathā busamuṣṭiḥ /
K10sf258_sc:35: Wal_21 sacec chāriputra upasenasya kulaputtrasya tasmiṁ samaye imā gāthāḥ pratyabhāsyaṁta imāni ca maṁtrapadāni nāsyāśīviṣaḥ kāye ’kramiṣyan nāsya kāyo viśariṣyat tadyathā busamuṣṭiḥ /
K10sf258_sc:36: Wal_22 yā bhadaṁta katamā gāthāḥ katamāni maṁtrapadāni //
K10sf258_sc:37: Wal_23 maitrī me dhṛtirāṣṭreṣu maitrī airāvaṇeṣu ca /
K10sf258_sc:39: Wal_24 karkoṭakeṣu me maitrī kṛṣṇagautamakeṣu ca /
K10sf258_sc:40: nandopandau ye nāgā teṣu maitrī ca me sadā //
K10sf258_sc:41: Wal_25 apādakeṣu me maitrī maitrī me dvipadeṣu ca /
K10sf258_sc:42: catuṣpadeṣu me maitrī maitrī bahupadeṣu ca //
K10sf258_sc:43: Wal_26 sarvvanāgeṣu me maitrī ye nāgā udadhiniśritāḥ /
K10sf258_sc:44: sarvvasatveṣu me maitrī ye ttrasāḥ sthāvarāś ca ye //
K10sf258_sc:45: Wal_27 sukhinaḥ sarvve satvā hi sarvve satvā niramayāḥ /
K10sf258_sc:46: sarvve bhadrāṇi paśyaṁtu mā caiśāṁ pāpam āgamat //
K10sf258_sc:49: Wal_29 yena me satyavākyena śāstā lokeṣv anuttaraḥ /
K10sf258_sc:50: tena me satyavākyena mā me kāye viṣaṁ kramet //
K10sf258_sc:51: Wal_30 rāgo dveṣaś ca mohaś ca ete loke viṣattrayam /
K10sf258_sc:53: Wal_31 hataṁ viṣaṁ ghoraviṣaṁ kṛto rakṣāparikaraḥ /
K10sf258_sc:54: sarvve hataviṣa biddhās tad uraga hataṁ viṣam //
K10sf258_sc:55: Wal_32 tatremāni mantrapadāni bhavaṁti tadyathā / otuṁbile / tuṁbile / tuṁbe / pratuṁbe / naṭṭe / sunaṭṭe / kevaṭṭe / munaye / samaye / datte / nīlakeśe / vālakupe / ole / oṅko / svāhā //
K10sf258_sc:56: Wal_33 sacec chāriputtra upasenasya kulaputrasya tasmiṁ samaye imā gāthāḥ pratyabhāyaṁta imāni ca maṁtrapadāni nāsyāśīviṣaṁ kāye ’kramiṣyat / nāsya kāyo vyaśariṣyat tadyathā busamuṣṭiḥ /
K10sf258_sc:57: Wal_34 tat kuta etad bhadaṁta labhyam āyuṣmata upasenena yat tasmiṁ samaye aśrutapūrvvā gāthāḥ pratibhāṣyaṁte aśrutapūrvvāṇi vā maṁtrapadāni tadyathā etarhi bhagavataḥ /
K10sf258_sc:58: Wal_35 athāyuṣmāñ śāriputtro bhagavato bhāṣitam abhinandyānumodya bhagavatpādau śirasā bhagavato ’ntikāt prakrāṁtaḥ //
